{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def GrandparentSplitter(train='train',valid='valid'):
    def splitter(item):
        if all(s not in item.parts for s in (train,valid)): return None
        if item.is_dir(): return None
        # valid=1, train=0
        return valid in item.parts 
    return splitter
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
base = default_loader_loop(
    L(path.rglob('*')),
    GrandparentSplitter()
)
